name: PROB_TXP_MODIFIERS
description: Table of modifiers related to transplant problems.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of this Problem List entry.

columns.name: BIOPSY_C_NAME
columns.description: Shows whether a biopsy was done to confirm organ rejection.  If a biopsy was performed, this column will display "yes." If not, the column will be blank.

columns.name: STENT_INSERTED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not a stent has been inserted due to a bronchial stricture.
